content: sts rem continued on next page ©2015 by virginia sattler-reimer 111 no radagast socks by virginia sattler-reimer gusset with rs of heel flap facing and smaller dpn pick up and knit 16 sts along edge of heel flap work instep sts as set in chart using larger needle pick up and knit 16 sts along other edge of heel flap with second smaller dpn knit 8 sts onto a separate larger needle end of round now begins at center of heel flap next round needle 1 with larger needle k8 heel flap sts k13 gusset sts from smaller dpn k2tog k1 needle 2 work chart as set needle 3 with larger needle k1 skp k13 from smaller needle k8 rem heel sts note set aside smaller needles and work remainder of sock on larger needles round 1 needles 1 & 3 k needle 2 work chart as set round 2 needle 1 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 work chart as set needle 3 k1 skp k to end of round repeat these two rnds until 52 sts rem foot keeping instep stitches in pattern continue foot until 3 5 repeats of chart have been worked then knit 2 rds plain or until foot is 4cm/1 5 less than desired finished length toe round 1 k round 2 needle 1 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 skp k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 needle 3 k1 skp k to end of round repeat these two rnds until 24 sts rem knit 6 sts from needle 1 onto needle 3 graft toe using kitchener stitch weave in ends and block as desired ©2015 by virginia sattler-reimer
